caption.p: Concentration–response curves of the vasorelaxant effect of A. campestris L. (AcEO) on ( a) isolated aorta pre-contracted with Phen 1 μM, and in the presence of TEA, 4-AP, BaCl 2 and Glibenclamide, and in the presence of ( b) Thapsigargin, Verapamil and Indomethacin. Values are mean ± SEM, n = 6, and analyzed with two way ANOVA followed by Bonferroni’s post-test; *** p < 0.001 vs control
